mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seckill(id, goods_id, goods_name, seckill_stock, seckill_starttime, seckill_endtime, seckill_creationtime, seckill_price, version) VALUES (NULL, #{goodsId}, #{goodsName}, #{seckillStock}, #{seckillStartTime}, #{seckillEndTime}, #{seckillCreationTime}, #{seckillPrice}, 0);
mapper.select:
SELECT seckill.id as id, seckill.goods_id, seckill.goods_name, seckill_stock,seckill_starttime, seckill_endtime, seckill_creationtime,seckill_price, goods_title, goods_img, goods_detail, goods_price, goods_stock FROM seckill LEFT JOIN goods on (goods.id = seckill.goods_id) WHERE seckill_starttime > #{startTime1} AND
seckill_starttime < #{startTime2}

SELECT seckill.id as id, seckill.goods_id, seckill.goods_name, seckill_stock,seckill_starttime, seckill_endtime, seckill_creationtime,seckill_price, goods_title, goods_img, goods_detail, goods_price, goods_stock FROM seckill LEFT JOIN goods on (goods.id = seckill.goods_id) WHERE seckill_endtime > #{endTime1} AND
seckill_endtime < #{endTime2}

SELECT seckill.id as id, seckill.goods_id, seckill.goods_name, seckill_stock,seckill_starttime, seckill_endtime, seckill_creationtime,seckill_price, goods_title, goods_img, goods_detail, goods_price, goods_stock FROM seckill LEFT JOIN goods on (goods.id = seckill.goods_id) where seckill.id = 1008
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seckilled(seckill_id, user_phone, goods_id, seckilled_state, seckilled_creationtime, seckilled_price, seckilled_number) VALUES (#{id}, #{userPhone}, #{goodsId}, #{seckilledState}, #{seckilledCreationTime}, #{seckilledPrice}, #{seckilledNumber})
mapper.select: select seckill_id,user_phone, seckilled_state, seckilled_creationtime, seckilled_price, seckilled_number, goods_id from seckilled where user_phone = #{userPhone}
select seckill_id,user_phone, seckilled_state, seckilled_creationtime, seckilled_price, seckilled_number, goods_id from seckilled where seckill_id = #{id} AND user_phone = #{userPhone}
mapper.update: UPDATE seckilled SET seckilled_state = #{state} WHERE seckill_id = #{id} AND user_phone = #{userPhone}
